original_text: And if I say to a wicked person, ‘You will surely die,’ but they then turn away from their sin and do what is just and right—
korean_text: 가령 내가 악인에게 말하기를 너는 죽으리라 하였다 하자 그가 돌이켜 자기의 죄에서 떠나서 정의와 공의로 행하여

sentences.original_text: And if I say to a wicked person
but they then turn away from their sin
and do what is just and right
